quotes.quote: Today will die tomorrow.
All the flowers of all the tomorrows are in the seed of today.
Today can be just another day or it can be the day that you finally went above and beyond your usual.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Today is the only time we can possibly live.
Today is a gift from God - that is why it is called the present.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Someone died today. Someone was born today. It's not just a dayâ€”it's a moment.
You had better live your best and act your best and think your best today; for today is the sure preparation for tomorrow and all the other tomorrows that follow.
Today is a most unusual day, because we have never lived it before; we will never live it again; it is the only day we have.
Today is a new day, so rise up and move forward into the victory God has prepared for you!
Live only for today, and you ruin tomorrow.
By studying yesterday, you will understand today.
Devote today to something so daring even you can't believe you're doing it.
Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.
Be happy with your today, don't chase the yesterday, and work hard for your desired tomorrow.
Today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness and every tomorrow a vision of hope. Look well therefore to this day
Forget yesterday â€“ it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow â€“ you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift â€“ today.
Never let yesterday use up too much of today.
Today is only one day in all the days that will ever be.
Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
Don't ever stumble over whats behind you. Neither trip over tomorrow. Just focus on today.
he beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday
Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today.
Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. Don't let your today be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future.
Today is a tomorrow that we thought about yesterday. Don't worry about tomorrow. Take care of today because if you take care of today tomorrow will take care of itself.
Yesterday is a canceled check. Tomorrow is a promissory note. Today is the only cash you have. So spend it wisely.
One today is worth two tomorrows.
